name: endpointAppsExt
description: Extension for partner endpoint applications that can onboard, control, and communicate with the device.

attributes.name: applications
attributes.description: Includes references to two types of application that connect with entrprise, i.e., deviceControl and telemetry.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'EndpointApp' resource which will control or obtain data from the device.

attributes.name: deviceControlEnterpriseEndpoint
attributes.description: The URL of the enterprise endpoint which device control apps use to reach enterprise network gateway.

attributes.name: telemetryEnterpriseEndpoint
attributes.description: The URL of the enterprise endpoint which telemetry apps use to reach enterprise network gateway.
